column5: Can anyone tell me where to order a good map of Lac Seul. I have the Navionics chip coming but would like a folding map too.Thanks

I don't have the latest greatest navionics chip if it has released an update for that part of Canada in the last year or so. I have fished the west side of LS numerous times and I would tell you to take what the chip says with a bit of salt. Being an impoundment the depths fluctuate. I also have found places in Sawmill Bay up past the sanctuary and a few other areas where we catcha lot of fish at times of the year which according to the Navionics chip I have are dry land and on dry land by some distance. So don't count on the chip to keep you off the rocks.
www.trakmaps.com These are the best maps I have seen. Great detail Good Luck, Mike Kansas
http://www.thornebros.com/shop/pc/Ca...-333p25968.htmCheapest place I found them this spring....
Thanks for all the help guys. I ordered from Thorne last night, they shipped today. Cant ask for better than that!

I really like Canada Map Sales (.com). I have maps from CMS of Press Lake & Pashkokogan...both lakes are remote, but drive in, and are north of Ignace. I was quite surprised that they produce them. As to your question about Lac Seul...I have a map from CMS of the western portion of Lac Seul. It is rather large and actually has been marked up a bit with places to try fishing...the marking was done by a couple of guys who have been fishing out of Lac Seul Lodge for many years. If you would send me your mailing address, I will mail the map to you...I have an extra of the same area, so no payment is requested. Just consider it a courtesy.
I sent you a PM with address...and thank you!
